question:
Your friend invited you to his/her party, but you are unable to attend. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
•explain why you cannot come
•give your reason for not contacting your friend sooner
•suggest another time to meetWrite
text: I was delighted to receive an invitation to your birthday party but, unfortunately, I won't able to come.

Two days before your party I have suddenly received a call from my grandfather, and he told me that my granny slipped from the staircase. Her left arm was severely injured and she has been hospitalized for three days. So I have to go there since my grandfather is not capable to take care of her alone. What's more, I have to stay with them until my grandmother will not be discharged from the hospital.

I did not contact you earlier because I was busy making arrangements to go to my grandparents' home because of short time booking of flight is always a daunting task. I think it might have inconvenienced you with such a late cancellation. If this is the case, I'm really sorry.

Despite not being able to come, I still have a little something for you. If you don't have any plans, I'd love to invite you for dinner somewhere in the city next week. Please let me know if you are available.
I wish you a wonderful birthday and looking forward to seeing you soon.
